body:
maybe people remember me. 

I have been on Avicus recently, and have been confused as in school about how to play the new DTM thing its weird.

Mods, before you lock it or something for being in the wrong area or whatever, can you please help me find an answer or better yet give me the answer. Thanks
body_tagged:

title: hi peeps

replies.body:
DTM hasn't changed at all
it's been the same forever

you might be talking about dtc


dtc is just breaking a bunch of obsidian to leak the lava outside of the obsidian sphere
you also need to break the side monuments (all blocks (example being all emerald or coal blocks)) to win.


see, this is why we need tutorials and the mapdevs aren't working on it and are busy fucking up other things and adding ocn maps (AND USING THEIR TIME TO XML THEM) instead of using maps they already have and should be updating (example being adding tutorials)

but if a map has a tutorial, just click the book during spectator (unless you're still below 1000xp and it's automated).


lol
